title: As a User, I want to see a Blank Trade Checklist In the Reporting Menu
custom_steps:
AC:
 - There will be a Trade Checklist link under the reporting menu in ebis
 - Clicking the link will open a PDF of the Trade Checklist
 - All the possible "values" will be visible
 - There will be no specific player information included on this checklist

title: As a User, I want to see a Blank Consent to Re-selection from In the Reporting Menu
custom_steps:
AC:
 - There will be a Consent to Re-Selection link under the reporting menu in ebis
 - Clicking the link will open a PDF of the Consent to Re-Selection
 - There will be no specific player information included form

title: New Visa Fees Field in AMT
custom_steps:
Wires:
Travel Auth Form: https://zpl.io/V1wdB8B
Visa Fees Modal: https://zpl.io/adwj9pL

AC:
 - There will be a new "Visa Fees" field added to Travel Expenses section of the Travel Auth Form in AMT, as depicted in the wire
 - There will be an icon next to the field name
 - Clicking the icon will display the following description in a modal:
  -- "Standard fees associated with required visa application for permissible tryout."

title: As a User, I want to create a Place on 15-day IL transaction
custom_steps:
Wireframe:
https://w6h8fs.axshare.com/#p=place_on_10-day_dl

Rules:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/2.+Place+on+10-Day+DL

Acceptance Criteria:
 - There will be a new Place on 15-Day IL transaction available under Transaction > Major > Injured List in the Create New menu
 - This will be on the Create New button on the Player History widget and Rosters widget for all players
 - Selecting "Place on 15-Day IL" will perform a Rule Check to see if the players is a Pitcher or a TWP
 - If the player is not a pitcher or a TWP, the system will return an error message:
  -- "Player must be a Pitcher or Two-Way Player to be placed on the 15-Day Injured List.  Please contact the BOC with any questions."
  -- Buttons: Back
 - The new transaction will will follow the same layout and rules as the existing 10-Day Injured List transaction
 - The calculated Earliest Reinstatement Date will reflect the 15 day timeframe

title: As a User, I want to create a Transfer to 15-day IL transaction
custom_steps:
Wireframe:
https://w6h8fs.axshare.com/#p=transfer_player_to_15-day_dl

Rules:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/3.+Transfer+to+10-Day+DL

Acceptance Criteria:
 - There will be a new Transfer to 15-Day IL transaction available under Transaction > Major > Injured List in the Create New menu
 - This will be on the Create New button on the Player History widget and Rosters widget for all players
 - Selecting "Transfer to 15-Day IL" will perform a Rule Check to see if the players is a Pitcher or a TWP
 - If the player is not a pitcher or a TWP, the system will return an error message:
  -- "Player must be a Pitcher or Two-Way Player to be transferred to the 15-Day Injured List.  Please contact the BOC with any questions."
  -- Buttons: Back
 - The new transaction will will follow the same layout and rules as the existing 10-Day Injured List transaction
 - The calculated Earliest Reinstatement Date will reflect the 15 day timeframe

title: Testing: Transfer Player from 15-Day IL to 60-Day IL

custom_steps:
Check position to make sure player is not a pitcher or a TWP

  -- Buttons: Back

title: As a User, I want players on the 15-Day IL to be Recertified for 15 Days
custom_steps:
Players on the 15-Day IL get recertified for 15 Days

Calculation of dates on the transaction screen

Wire:
https://w6h8fs.axshare.com/#p=recertify_a_player

AC:
 - When re-certifying a player on the 15-Day IL, the Earliest Reinstatement Date will be calculated to reflect the 15 Day term for recertification

title: As a User, I want Recertification Widget updated for 15-Day IL Transactions
custom_steps:
Wire:
https://w6h8fs.axshare.com/#p=recertification

AC:
 - Updates will be made to the Recertification Widget to accommodate the new 15-Day IL
  -- Recertification Due dates will be calculated using the 15 day period
  -- Alerts and color changes (i.e. when a recert is passed due) will be calculated using the 15 day period

title: As a User, I want reporting updates for 15-Day IL
custom_steps:
AC:
 - Report views should be updated to accommodate the new 15-Day IL roster status

title: As a User, I want a Rule Check added to Recall Transactions
custom_steps:
The minimum assignment period for pitchers or TWP who are optionally assigned to the minors is 15 Days.

AC:
 - When creating a Recall transaction, the system will perform a Rule Check to see if the players is a Pitcher or a TWP
 - If the player is a pitcher or a TWP, and has not been optionally assigned for at least 15 days, the system will return an error message:
  -- "The minimum assignment period for pitchers or two-way players who are optionally assigned to the minors is 15 Days.  Please contact the BOC with any questions."
  -- Buttons: Back
 - Auto-Recall Batch shouldn't be prevented from returning players because of the minimum

title: As a User, I want the UI logic updated to display correct Earliest Recall Date
custom_steps:
The minimum assignment period for pitchers or TWP who are optionally assigned to the minors is 15 Days.

Wires:
MJ Roster:  https://b6mbog.axshare.com/#p=major_league_roster
Player Profiles: https://ll2j6l.axshare.com/#p=waivers___transactions

AC:
 - The Elig Recall Date on the UI will be updated to account for the 15 Day minimum for pitchers and TWP in the following places:
 - MJ Roster Widget
 - Player Profiles (Options section of the transactions tab)

title: As a User, I want Report logic updated to display correct Earliest Recall Dates
custom_steps:
The minimum assignment period for pitchers or TWP who are optionally assigned to the minors is 15 Days.

AC:
The view for the Player Information Report will be updated so Elig Recall Date accounts for the 15 Day minimum for pitchers and TWP
